dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: So it comes down to this. I'll probably die soon.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: In such a peaceful place...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...What.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ha, haha...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You're right, it doesn't recognize me.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I may be filled with husks right now, but I know...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I'm almost there. Soon... I'll make my own technology to fill myself up.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I'll gather a team again... hire another secretary... There'll be a lot to do.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: So... I don't think I'll need you anymore.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: ...Dongrang? I wonder how long will you keep me waiting.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, sorry for the delay. I was reminded of something I left in my hometown...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: But I've realized that now is the time to be thinking about what I'll gain from now on instead of what I left behind.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Anyone can have a moment of foolishness.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Right, so... You know about a way to generate an endless stream of tears, do you?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: To reach a certain quota, people are tortured... then cured using the tears... then tortured again...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It's such a waste to keep spending a portion of tears on that.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: True, so we're importing footage from a variety of Wings and Backstreets Syndicates as a substitute.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: They're asking higher and higher prices for the audiovisual feed, aren't they?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Other factions are starting to notice that we're in evident need of it, albeit faintly. Even if they don't know what exactly it's used for in K Corp.

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Hee... huhee... huhnh...

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: Could you please... break a finger now?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: See. Your subordinate tied to this chair seems to have lost it, too.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I shouldn't close my eyes.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Miss Carmen... I believe that's not exactly the case. The path hasn't ended, and I finally see clearly where I should go.
Dongrang... after coming such a long way 'round... have you at last returned to this path?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: When I look into the eye... I don't feel the sympathy I used to feel anymore.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Instead... Do you see that? A pale imitation of the League's renowned glass window, made by leeching off it... It's now become the flag that raised the esteem of K Corp's Singularity high.
...Yes, I can see it well.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Brother Young-ji has left, Dongbaek has returned to the bed of flowers...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: All that's left is a parasitic mutation of Young-ji's glass...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: My shoddy copy of the glass, which didn't manage to be anything.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: What use is technology that can't change the world?

dataList.title: Effloresced E.G.O::Farmwatch
dataList.content: So I want you to stop caring like I have. Let it cry for our agony and sorrow in our stead.
